We are Talentpilot, where our mission is to increase human productivity through trusted AI.

We are looking for an exceptional AI Engineerâ€”someone who wants to validate whether AI agents will be the next big thing with us and improve how businesses work with their most valuable assetâ€”their people. 

Weâ€™re looking for curious and open-minded individuals who thrive in ambiguity and enjoy both engineering and experimentation. A person who will help us develop cutting-edge agents for HR functions. This includes solving both engineering and experimental challenges, such as:

  • Scaling and optimizing AI workflows.

  • Setting up new infrastructure.

  • Validating different models and tools.

  • Establishing evaluation frameworks. 

At Talentpilot, we believe the diversity of problems we solve stems from the diversity of our people. You will join our team of talented AI specialists, psychologists, engineers, and product designers who collaborate closely to drive innovation. Being part of a small company means your work will have visibility and impactâ€”we count on each team member to bring fresh perspectives and help amplify the knowledge weâ€™ve built.

  • Enhance and sustain our internal tech stack while identifying and integrating state-of-the-art technologies.

  • Share insights from experiments and actively participate in discussions to guide the development of scalable, production-ready solutions.


What we expect from you

  • Solid track record of delivering impactful data science and machine learning projects in production.

  • You are passionate about product development and customer focus.

  • Proven ability to work autonomously and drive tasks to completion.

  • A strong background in Python, with expertise in building applications and maintaining ML systems in production environments.

  • Comfortable using git and CI/CD pipelines.

Talentpilot is a true startup in every sense. We are revolutionizing human productivity, which requires hard work and high expectations from every individual. The pressure to perform is extreme. On the other hand, we offer the opportunity to work on a product that extends beyond the borders of the Czech Republic, with a team of A-players where each person is fully responsible for their own agenda.
